page.title: 17MR.FORDS TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
Mr. Ford works at one of the breweries in Tadcaster.His job is to help bottle the beer. He has a wife and two sons.
Get up at 5am have breakfast 5.10 till 5.30 wash and shave 5.30 to 5.40. Go to work 5.40 /6.00. Prepare for bottling beer 6.00/8.00.Bottling run 8.00/11.45.Tea break 10.10/10.30.Come home for dinner 11.45/12.50.Wash go back to work. Bottling run 12.50/5.00 home time. pick kids up from Mothers.Have tea.Do jobs around the house/ gardening/car. Watch television 8.00/10.00.Bed.
